```{r}
add2 <- function(x, y) {
  x + y ## the last executed statement is the return value
}

print(add2(42, 23))
```

```{r}
abovee10 <- function(x) {
  x[x > 10]
}
```

```{r}
above <- function(x, n) {
  x[x > n]
}
```

```{r}
above <- function(x, n = 10) {
  x[x > n]
}
```

```{r}
columnMean <- function(y, removeNA = TRUE) {
  nc <- ncol(y)
  means <- numeric(nc)
  
  for(i in 1:nc) {
    means[i] <- mean(y[, i], na.rm = removeNA)
  }
  means
}
```

```{r}
make.power <- function(n) {
  pow <- function(x) {
    x ^ n
  }
}

cube <- make.power(3)
square <- make.power(2)

cube(3)
square(3)
```

```{r}
ls(environment(cube))
get("n", environment(cube))
```

```{r}
ls(environment(square))
get("n", environment(square))
```

```{r}
y <- 10

f <- function(x) {
  y <- 2
  y ^ 2 + g(x)
}

g <- function(x) {
  x * y
}
```

```{r}
f(3)
## in f(3)
## 2 ^ 2 + g(3) -> in g
## 3 * 10 and
## 2 ^ 2 + 30 -> 34
```
